mapper.select: SELECT de.id, de.code, de.name, de.description, de.createTime FROM al_department de
SELECT de.id, de.code, de.name FROM al_department de
SELECT de.id, de.code, de.name, de.description FROM al_department de WHERE de.id = #{id}
SELECT de.code FROM al_department de WHERE de.id = #{departmentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO al_department ( id, code, name, description ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{description} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE code = #{code}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}
